name: TAXIdermy (itch)
description:
TAXIdermy is a game where you play as a Taxidermist/Cab Driver who acquires his pelts by running over animals. Drive around town taking taxidermy orders, hunting down your prey, stuffing it on the hood of your taxi, and delivering your finished product.

How To Play:

Arrow Keys:  Drive Car

Mouse:  Hold / Use Items

Escape:  Menu / Quit Game

Credits:

Sterling Rios: Programming, Design, Audio

Ezra Robinson: Programming, Design, Art

Sully Zack: Programming, Design, Art

Music Provided By: Kevin MacLeod
